text:
[Verse]
Puddles on the street
Rhythm in my feet
Splashing as I dance
Gotta take this chance

[Verse]
Lightning in the sky
Echoes flying high
Feeling so alive
In this storm we thrive

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy
No pain
Let the world see
This freedom in me

[Verse]
Twirling round and round
Happiness we've found
Laughter in the air
Problems we don't care

[Bridge]
Drops are falling fast
Moment here to last
Hearts in every beat
Life is feeling sweet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the joy
No pain
Let the world see
This freedom in me
title: Dancing in the Rain
